jobs.title: Senior Product Designer (f/m/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
EoT Labs and flagship project peaq were founded under the belief that a better trajectory for humanity exists. We’re building a global, borderless, machine economy that works for all humans on earth.

More than 20 industries are already being positively shaped by this next generation of apps built on peaq. This is an opportunity to join a team of performance-driven entrepreneurs, engineers, and creatives, on a mission to unlock the Age of Abundance.

We're looking for a highly skilled and entrepreneurial Senior Product Designer (f/m/d) to join and own Product Design.

Responsibilities

  • Own the design process end-to-end — from research and ideation to high-fidelity design, prototyping, and developer handoff.

  • Lead UX for consumer-facing experiences that make blockchain and DePIN products intuitive, engaging, and delightful.

  • Contribute to developer experience (DX) — helping to design tools, dashboards, and docs that make it easy for developers to build on peaq.

  • Leverage AI in design workflows to explore faster iterations, improve research synthesis, and enhance creative exploration.

  • Collaborate closely with product managers, engineers, and ecosystem partners to align on goals, validate solutions, and ship impactful products.

  • Maintain a systems mindset — ensuring consistency across all surfaces, design components and interaction patterns while pushing for innovation where it creates the most impact.

Basic Qualifications and Requirements

  • 4+ years professional experience as a Senior Product Designer or Senior UX Designer, with a portfolio showcasing end-to-end ownership of digital product design.

  • Strong UX focus — skilled at simplifying complex concepts into intuitive flows.

  • Strong understanding of the interplay between brand and product — recognizing that they’re not just connected, but deeply intertwined in shaping user experience.

  • Experience using AI tools (e.g., for ideation, wireframing, research synthesis, or asset generation) to accelerate the design process.

  • Cross-functional collaboration skills — you’re comfortable working with the brand team, engineers, PMs, and external stakeholders.

  • Experience and ability to work independently and drive the design process from exploration through launch in a fast paced, distributed startup environment.

  • Hands-on experience in crypto, DeFi, or Web3.

Preferred Skills & Experience

  • Experience in mentoring/guiding fellow designers.

Benefits

  • Remote first. You’ll be joining a team working from all over the world.

  • Flexible working arrangements. Create your own journey with flexible working schedules and locations.

  • The opportunity to build and contribute to high-impact projects in a new industry that will positively shape the lives of hundreds of millions of people.

  • High growth potential. Room to grow professionally, while learning new skills and working at the cutting edge of the decentralized Machine Economy.

  • A warm and open culture at an international organization with team members from all four corners of the globe.

  • An environment that values autonomy, team spirit and open communication.

We look forward to building the future with you.

jobs.title: Senior Solution Engineer (f/m/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
EoT Labs and flagship project peaq were founded under the belief that a better trajectory for humanity exists. We’re building a global, borderless, machine economy that works for all humans on earth.

More than 20 industries are already being positively shaped by this next generation of apps built on peaq. This is an opportunity to join a team of performance-driven entrepreneurs, engineers, and creatives, on a mission to unlock the Age of Abundance.

We’re looking for a skilled and detail-oriented Senior Solution Engineer (f/m/d) to join our Engineering team (Build) and help build products that meet the highest quality standards and contribute to an exceptional developer experience.
You will be instrumental in providing hands-on technical support to our ecosystem projects and building scalable Web3 applications, SDKs, and tools that power decentralised experiences for users and developers alike.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain production-grade Web3 applications using Solidity and Javascript.

  • Build and maintain JavaScript/TypeScript SDKs and client libraries that abstract complex blockchain logic for internal and external developers.

  • Actively provide technical support to projects building on peaq network.

  • Lead the development of decentralised applications (dApps) that integrate with smart contracts across EVM-compatible chains.

  • Work with blockchain interaction libraries such as Ethers.js, Web3.js, and Viem to build secure and performant integrations.

  • Implement and support token standards including ERC-20, ERC-721, and ERC-1155, with attention to interoperability and gas efficiency.

  • Develop scalable backend services and APIs using REST and GraphQL, ensuring high performance and uptime.

  • Optimise frontend and backend systems for scalability, security, and performance across different environments and user contexts.

  • Collaborate cross-functionally with blockchain engineers, product managers, designers, and QA to deliver features with high impact and usability.

  • Write clean, modular, and well-documented code adhering to Web3 best practices.

  • Contribute to the architecture, testing, versioning, and packaging of SDKs for external developer use.

  • Conduct code reviews, help guide junior team members in engineering and Web3 best practices.

  • Stay up to date with the latest trends in blockchain protocols, smart contract development, wallet integrations, and Web3 tooling.

  • Actively contribute to internal engineering standards and drive improvements in development workflows and developer experience.

Basic Qualifications & Requirements

  • 3+ years of experience as a BackendDeveloper.

  • 3+ years of experience as a Blockchain Developer.

  • Proven experience working with JavaScript & TypeScript.

  • Some experience working with Next.js, React.js, and Node.js for full stack development.

  • Hands-on experience with blockchain and Web3 development.

  • Proficiency with Web3.js, Ethers.js, or Viem to interact with smart contracts.

  • Understanding of Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM), Solidity, and smart contract development.

  • Familiarity with RPCs, IPFS, The Graph for blockchain data access.

  • Strong understanding of security best practices in Web3 applications.

  • Experience with centralized databases such as PostgreSQL, MySQL and MongoDB.

  • Experience with decentralised databases such as IPFS, FileBase, Arweave, Crust and Filecoin etc.

Preferred Skills & Experience

  • Hands-on experience with Solidity and smart contract development.

  • Experience with Substrate and pallet development.

  • Knowledge of DeFi, DAOs, or NFT marketplaces.

  • Understanding of decentralized storage solutions (IPFS, Arweave, Filecoin).

  • Familiarity with DiDs, VCs and VPs, RBACs.

  • Familiarity with Swift (iOS) SDK development.

  • Familiarity with Kotlin (Android) SDK development.

  • Familiarity with Flutter SDK development.

  • Familiarity with libP2P development.

Benefits

  • Remote first. You’ll be joining a team working from all over the world.

  • Flexible working arrangements. Create your own journey with flexible working schedules and locations.

  • The opportunity to build and contribute to high-impact projects in a new industry that will positively shape the lives of hundreds of millions of people.

  • High growth potential. Room to grow professionally, while learning new skills and working at the cutting edge of the decentralized Machine Economy.

  • A warm and open culture at an international organization with team members from all four corners of the globe.

  • An environment that values autonomy, team spirit and open communication.

We look forward to building the future with you.

jobs.title: Senior Social Media Manager (f/m/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
EoT Labs and flagship project peaq were founded under the belief that a better trajectory for humanity exists. We’re building a global, borderless, machine economy that works for all humans on earth.

More than 20 industries are already being positively shaped by this next generation of apps built on peaq. This is an opportunity to join a team of performance-driven entrepreneurs, engineers, and creatives, on a mission to unlock the Age of Abundance.

We're looking for an experienced and detail-oriented Senior Social Media Manager (f/m/d) who will own peaq's social media presence, take it to the next level, work to bring raise awareness that a new planet-scale public good is here – and anyone, anywhere can (and should) opt in. You will work closely with our communications teams, creating and executing engaging campaigns across platforms, driving our brand growth, community engagement, and conversions.

Responsibilities

  • Lead social storytelling – Craft compelling narratives that bring peaq’s Machine Economy vision to life and resonate with diverse audiences across Web3 and beyond.

  • Bring peaq to the masses – Take peaq from a jargon heavy, Web3-oriented project to a global brand prioritizing simple language.

  • Own multi-channel strategy – Manage and grow peaq’s social presence (Twitter/X, Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube) and those of related brands (such as EoT Labs), ensuring each channel aligns with our brand voice and business goals.

  • Create content that connects – Translate complex, technical concepts into engaging, accessible content for both crypto-native and non-technical communities.

  • Market our products and drive conversion – Bring people into the peaqosystem with effective prod-comms strategies.

  • Keep our community informed and inspired – Deliver timely updates on milestones, product launches, partnerships, and ecosystem developments.

  • Collaborate for impact – Work closely with design and other teams to produce high-quality visuals, videos, and multimedia campaigns.

  • Stay ahead of trends – Monitor the evolving Web3, DePIN, and crypto landscape to identify opportunities for fresh, relevant content.

  • Measure and optimise – Analyse performance metrics, gather insights, and continuously refine strategies to maximise reach and engagement.

  • Manage resources effectively – Oversee social media budgets and expenditures to ensure high ROI and efficient campaign execution.

Basic Qualifications & Requirements

  • 5+ years managing social media for tech or digital brands; at least 1 year in Web3/crypto

  • You have better English than the King. C2-level English writing and editing skills.

  • Deep Twitter/X knowledge — you get the platform, culture, and know how to make content trend (we will want to see your handle and 1–2 managed accounts)

  • Crypto-native mindset — you live and breathe Web3, staying ahead of trends and speaking the language

  • Skilled across multiple platforms — LinkedIn, YouTube, paid and organic campaigns

  • Strategic thinker — you quickly grasp peaq’s vision and create social strategies that inspire both crypto insiders and newcomers

  • Creative leader — you take ownership, raise content quality, and mentor others to excel

  • Artist – You see every post as a work of art – you’re extremely sensitive to there being a full stop where there shouldn’t be, an extra space, a post that looks aesthetically unbalanced.

Preferred Skills & Experience

  • In depth knowledge of multiple blockchain ecosystems (e.g., Ethereum, Polkadot, Solana, Binance, Base).

  • Experience or strong understanding of Layer 1 blockchain fundamentals to create clear, engaging content around peaq’s technology.

Benefits

  • Remote first. You’ll be joining a team working from all over the world.

  • Flexible working arrangements. Create your own journey with flexible working schedules and locations.

  • The opportunity to build and contribute to high-impact projects in a new industry that will positively shape the lives of hundreds of millions of people.

  • High growth potential. Room to grow professionally, while learning new skills and working at the cutting edge of the decentralized Machine Economy.

  • A warm and open culture at an international organization with team members from all four corners of the globe.

  • An environment that values autonomy, team spirit and open communication.

We look forward to building the future with you.

jobs.title: Junior Product Manager (f/m/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
EoT Labs and flagship project peaq were founded under the belief that a better trajectory for humanity exists. We’re building a global, borderless, machine economy that works for all humans on earth.

More than 20 industries are already being positively shaped by this next generation of apps built on peaq. This is an opportunity to join a team of performance-driven entrepreneurs, engineers, and creatives, on a mission to unlock the Age of Abundance.

We are seeking a skilled Junior Product Manager (f/m/d) with Web3 experience to lead the coordination and execution of complex, multi-stakeholder projects at peaq. Your primary focus will be driving the successful relaunch of Get Real — a major growth campaign designed to onboard new users and strengthen ecosystem engagement. This role requires expertise managing cross-functional teams, navigating client relationships, and collaborating with multiple decentralised physical infrastructure networks (DePINs).

Key Responsibilities:

  • Lead product management efforts for the Get Real campaign, coordinating two development teams, multiple DePIN partners, and various internal and external stakeholders.

  • Develop detailed project plans, timelines, and workflows to ensure smooth execution and timely delivery.

  • Serve as the primary point of contact for client-facing interactions related to the campaign and integrations.

  • Collaborate with product and engineering teams to help design the reward system, ensuring it aligns with growth and engagement goals.

  • Assist with manual data entry and backend data management as needed to support campaign tracking and reporting.

  • Proactively identify risks, blockers, and dependencies, and work cross-functionally to resolve them.

  • Communicate project status clearly and regularly to leadership and stakeholders.

  • Bring a strong understanding of Web3 ecosystems, smart contracts, and decentralised infrastructure to anticipate challenges and innovate solutions.

Basic Qualifications & Requirements

  • Proven experience managing complex Web3 or blockchain-related projects with multiple teams and external partners.

  • Strong organisational skills, attention to detail, and the ability to manage multiple priorities simultaneously.

  • Comfortable working in fast-paced, evolving environments with cross-disciplinary teams.

  • Client-facing experience with excellent communication and relationship-building skills.

  • Technical aptitude to understand blockchain concepts, tokenomics, and backend workflows.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Familiarity with DePIN (Decentralised Physical Infrastructure Networks) or similar decentralised integrations.

  • Bonus: Background in gaming or experience managing projects related to gaming ecosystems.

Benefits

  • Remote first. You’ll be joining a team working from all over the world.

  • Flexible working arrangements. Create your own journey with flexible working schedules and locations.

  • The opportunity to build and contribute to high-impact projects in a new industry that will positively shape the lives of hundreds of millions of people.

  • High growth potential. Room to grow professionally, while learning new skills and working at the cutting edge of the decentralized Machine Economy.

  • A warm and open culture at an international organization with team members from all four corners of the globe.

  • An environment that values autonomy, team spirit and open communication.

We look forward to building the future with you.

jobs.title: Head of Marketing (f/m/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
EoT Labs and flagship project peaq were founded under the belief that a better trajectory for humanity exists. We’re building a global, borderless, machine economy that works for all humans on earth.

More than 20 industries are already being positively shaped by this next generation of apps built on peaq. This is an opportunity to join a team of performance-driven entrepreneurs, engineers, and creatives, on a mission to unlock the Age of Abundance.

As Head of Marketing (f/m/d) at peaq, you’ll own and scale our global marketing and communications efforts, driving adoption and brand recognition. You’ll work directly with the founders, lead a team of ~10 today – and grow it further as we scale, and set the strategies to attract users, developers, and partners.

We’re looking for someone who has already operated at the very top — either leading or playing a key role in a top-100 Web3 project with world-class communications, or driving marketing for a leading tech company while being a Web3 user and advocate.

Responsibilities

  • Lead & Grow the Team: Inspire and scale a global team across Marketing, Community, PR, and Events – while working hand-in-hand with the Creative team.

  • Own Growth: Scale users, developers, and ecosystem adoption. Track funnels, CAC, LTV, conversion, and retention — and act on insights.

  • Drive Adoption: Partner with our CBO to design and execute country-by-country go-to-market strategies across priority regions.

  • Shape Brand & Content: Oversee all output, from campaigns to visuals, ensuring world-class quality and consistency across every post and engagement.

  • Amplify Ecosystem: Highlight project successes, attract new builders, and make peaq the go-to brand in the Machine Economy in and beyond Web3.

  • PR, Narrative & Positioning: Build up peaq’s core narratives in tech and mainstream media. Be comfortable as a spokesperson on stage, with media, and with partners.

  • Community & Social: Lead channels with a voice that resonates beyond crypto; ship content and incentive loops that convert attention into active builders and users.

  • Events & Partnerships: Curate hackathons, summits, and activations with measurable pipeline and community impact.

  • Ops & Analytics: Own martech, dashboards, budget pacing; create systems and processes that scale globally.

Basic Qualifications & Requirements

  • 7+ years of experience in senior marketing roles with 2+ in leadership.

  • You’ve either scaled a top-100 Web3 project with standout comms and growth, or run marketing/growth at a leading global tech company and are a strong Web3 advocate, or have led your own marketing agency for 5+ years successfully.

  • Proven track record delivering at least 2 successful digital product GTMs with public, measurable results.

  • Experience managing and scaling teams in high-growth environments.

  • Exceptional communicator and storyteller. Your English is on par with the King’s and you hold everyone to the highest standards of expression.

  • You’re a full stack marketer.

  • Sales-minded: you can pitch, persuade, and close.

  • You get the Web3/crypto culture, especially on X.

  • Strong sense for the brand – what works, what doesn’t – and you’ve got a keen eye for detail. You’re a perfectionist.

  • Ability to translate deep tech into simple, compelling narratives.

Preferred Skills & Experience

  • Equal parts strategist, operator, and visionary.

  • Comfortable challenging assumptions and moving fast.

  • Passionate about making a global impact.

  • Global mindset; customer-focused; owner mentality.

Benefits

  • Remote first. You’ll be joining a team working from all over the world.

  • Flexible working arrangements. Create your own journey with flexible working schedules and locations.

  • The opportunity to build and contribute to high-impact projects in a new industry that will positively shape the lives of hundreds of millions of people.

  • High growth potential. Room to grow professionally, while learning new skills and working at the cutting edge of the decentralized Machine Economy.

  • A warm and open culture at an international organization with team members from all four corners of the globe.

  • An environment that values autonomy, team spirit and open communication.

We look forward to building the future with you.

EoT Labs and flagship project peaq were founded under the belief that a better trajectory for humanity exists. We’re building a global, borderless, machine economy that works for all humans on earth.

More than 20 industries are already being positively shaped by this next generation of apps built on peaq. This is an opportunity to join a team of performance-driven entrepreneurs, engineers, and creatives, on a mission to unlock the Age of Abundance.

As Head of Marketing (f/m/d) at peaq, you’ll own and scale our global marketing and communications efforts, driving adoption and brand recognition. You’ll work directly with the founders, lead a team of ~10 today – and grow it further as we scale, and set the strategies to attract users, developers, and partners.

We’re looking for someone who has already operated at the very top — either leading or playing a key role in a top-100 Web3 project with world-class communications, or driving marketing for a leading tech company while being a Web3 user and advocate.


RESPONSIBILITIES

 - Lead & Grow the Team: Inspire and scale a global team across Marketing, Community, PR, and Events – while working hand-in-hand with the Creative team.

 - Own Growth: Scale users, developers, and ecosystem adoption. Track funnels, CAC, LTV, conversion, and retention — and act on insights.

 - Drive Adoption: Partner with our CBO to design and execute country-by-country go-to-market strategies across priority regions.

 - Shape Brand & Content: Oversee all output, from campaigns to visuals, ensuring world-class quality and consistency across every post and engagement.

 - Amplify Ecosystem: Highlight project successes, attract new builders, and make peaq the go-to brand in the Machine Economy in and beyond Web3.

 - PR, Narrative & Positioning: Build up peaq’s core narratives in tech and mainstream media. Be comfortable as a spokesperson on stage, with media, and with partners.

 - Community & Social: Lead channels with a voice that resonates beyond crypto; ship content and incentive loops that convert attention into active builders and users.

 - Events & Partnerships: Curate hackathons, summits, and activations with measurable pipeline and community impact.

 - Ops & Analytics: Own martech, dashboards, budget pacing; create systems and processes that scale globally.
   


BASIC QUALIFICATIONS & REQUIREMENTS

 - 7+ years of experience in senior marketing roles with 2+ in leadership.

 - You’ve either scaled a top-100 Web3 project with standout comms and growth, or run marketing/growth at a leading global tech company and are a strong Web3 advocate, or have led your own marketing agency for 5+ years successfully.

 - Proven track record delivering at least 2 successful digital product GTMs with public, measurable results.

 - Experience managing and scaling teams in high-growth environments.

 - Exceptional communicator and storyteller. Your English is on par with the King’s and you hold everyone to the highest standards of expression.

 - You’re a full stack marketer.

 - Sales-minded: you can pitch, persuade, and close.

 - You get the Web3/crypto culture, especially on X.

 - Strong sense for the brand – what works, what doesn’t – and you’ve got a keen eye for detail. You’re a perfectionist.

 - Ability to translate deep tech into simple, compelling narratives.
   


PREFERRED SKILLS & EXPERIENCE

 - Equal parts strategist, operator, and visionary.

 - Comfortable challenging assumptions and moving fast.

 - Passionate about making a global impact.

 - Global mindset; customer-focused; owner mentality.


BENEFITS

 - Remote first. You’ll be joining a team working from all over the world.

 - Flexible working arrangements. Create your own journey with flexible working schedules and locations.

 - The opportunity to build and contribute to high-impact projects in a new industry that will positively shape the lives of hundreds of millions of people.

 - High growth potential. Room to grow professionally, while learning new skills and working at the cutting edge of the decentralized Machine Economy.

 - A warm and open culture at an international organization with team members from all four corners of the globe.

 - An environment that values autonomy, team spirit and open communication.

We look forward to building the future with you.
